actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on ion exchange resin - Methanamine, N methyl reaction products with chloromethylated divinylbenzene-styrene polymer.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on ion exchange resin - Methanamine, N methyl reaction products with chloromethylated divinylbenzene-styrene polymer.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on ion exchange resin - Methanamine, N methyl reaction products with chloromethylated divinylbenzene-styrene polymer.
